relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare cites continued disruptive momentum in SSE market demonstrated via analyst recognition
relatedBlades.subtitle: Forrester names Cloudflare a Strong Performer
relatedBlades.copy:
Cloudflare has been recognized as a Strong Performer in "The Forrester Wave™: Zero Trust Platforms, Q3 2023" report, receiving the highest scores possible, 5.0/5.0, in the innovation, roadmap, pricing flexibility & transparency, and hybrid workforce enablement & protection criteria. 

After being the only new vendor recognized in the 2023 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for SSE, a few months later Cloudflare is recognized by Forrester as a Strong Performer among Zero Trust
Platform providers. We claim this recognition validates our commitment to help organizations of any size secure hybrid work, defend against threats, and protect their data on their path to consolidation.

According to the report:
- "Cloudflare's roadmap reflects the company's dedication to innovation that takes a customer-led approach in addressing growing trends and unique demands."
- "As an access broker and DNS reverse proxy, Cloudflare One does well in providing a centralized and consolidated platform to manage and orchestrate many of its cloud-native solutions for ease of use and quicker deployments."
- "Midsize-to-large enterprises with a cloud-first initiative to actively migrate resources and replace legacy WAN and VPN solutions should evaluate Cloudflare One."
